name: Afghan Hound
description: Tall and slender with a long, narrow, refined head, silky topknot and powerful jaws.It has silky coat and curled tail

name: Basenji
description: Smooth, muscular and athletic dog. It has small eyes, straight ears, a wrinkled forehead, and long legs.

name: Cavalier King Charles Spaniel
description: Small sized dog with long and silky coat. It has beautiful eyes and long fluffy ears.

name: Dalmatian
description: Large, strong, muscular dog. It has soft ears, medium size eyes and short coat

name: German Shepherd
description: They are smart, courageous, and intelligent dog breed. Now these days, these dogs are used for the guarding purpose and as a service dogs.
